name: Qasim Zahid
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Dynamic and results-oriented Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience building secure, scalable, and high-performance web applications across diverse domains including Healthcare, E-commerce, Insurance, Cybersecurity, Supply Chain, and Education.
Specialized in delivering AI-powered enterprise solutions, with deep expertise in Angular, React, Node.js, and .NET Core.
Proficient in integrating machine learning and NLP models into real-world systems using OpenAI API, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, and LangChain.
Experienced in architecting microservices and deploying platforms via AWS, Azure, and GCP.
Strong emphasis on performance optimization, security, and maintainability.
Known for strategic problem-solving and innovation at scale.

responsibilities: • Highly skilled Full Stack Developer with hands-on experience in Angular, React.js, Next.js, Node.js/Express.js, and C#/.NET, with a strong emphasis on TypeScript and C# across all frameworks.
• Led end-to-end development for five complex applications using MEAN, MERN, .NET, and Python stacks—overseeing design, implementation, debugging, and testing.
• Designed and deployed AI-driven modules for a healthcare platform enabling predictive patient risk analysis using Python, TensorFlow, LangChain, and Angular.
• Implemented personalized eCommerce experiences using OpenAI APIs, including smart product recommendations and dynamic filters—boosting engagement and conversions.
• Modernized insurance systems with GPT-3.5-powered chatbots and automated forms, streamlining policy issuance and improving customer service speed.
• Developed serverless APIs using Azure Functions and AWS Lambda for real-time data processing in healthcare and retail applications.
• Optimized database queries, achieving 20% faster response times across multiple high-load systems.
• Enhanced app performance by reducing server requests by 40% through strategic caching implementations.
• Expert in Microsoft Azure, including Function Apps and Logic Apps for deploying and managing cloud-native, scalable workflows.
• Built and integrated RESTful and GraphQL APIs, enhancing front-end feature availability and responsiveness.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve feature integration, driving seamless UI/UX delivery.
• Contributed to Agile practices through daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives—improving team output by 15%.
• Ensured high code quality through peer reviews, reducing technical debt by 25%.
• Boosted application scalability with targeted performance testing, leading to a 30% increase in capacity.
• Resolved over 50 technical issues for clients, providing timely support and improving satisfaction scores.
• Built, tested, and maintained high-performance SPAs using Angular and React.
• Mentored junior developers, accelerating onboarding and improving team skillset—reducing ramp-up time by 15%.
• Reduced development timelines by 20% using modular architecture and reusable custom components.
• Enhanced page performance by 25% via optimization techniques such as lazy loading and code splitting.
Developed full-stack web applications using Angular, React, Node.js, and MongoDB, consistently delivering projects ahead of schedule.
Spearheaded the successful launch of scalable Outreach Manager applications, leading a cross-functional development team.
Created real-time monitoring dashboards, dynamic form builders, and modular web components for both Angular and React environments.
Enabled reala-time interactivity across applications, significantly boosting user engagement and responsiveness.
Improved application security by 30% through the implementation of secure coding standards and proactive vulnerability mitigation
Achieved 25% faster build times by adopting optimized coding patterns and bundling strategies in Angular and React.
Enhanced performance of enterprise-scale applications by developing reusable components and integrating Redux for robust state management.
Contributed within an Agile development lifecycle, ensuring iterative delivery of scalable, high-performance applications.
Improved API integration efficiency through close collaboration with backend teams, ensuring seamless front-end communication.
Accelerated feature delivery using advanced error handling, logging, and prioritization strategies.
Integrated multiple third-party APIs to expand functionality and reduce custom development cycles, cutting down overall dev time.
Implemented a gateway server for distributed authentication to ensure load balancing and secure session management.
Automated and streamlined deployment workflows with Docker and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), improving monitoring and reliability in production environments.

skills: Frontend: HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, Angular (Versions 2+ to latest), RxJS, NgRx, Redux, Context API,Material-UI, Bootstrap, Ant Design, Zustand, React Query, Tailwind CSS .
Backend: Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, ASP.Net ,ASP.Net Core, C#/.Net.
State Management: Recoil, Zustand, MobX, Redux (Thunk, Saga).
Performance Optimization: Code Splitting, Webpack Optimization, Route Guards, Custom Directives & Pipes, Virtual DOM, Lazy Loading.
API Development & Integration: RESTful APIs, GraphQL, Apollo Client, Axios, WebSockets.
Testing & Tools: Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress, Mocha, Chai, Webpack, Babel, NPM, Yarn, Gulp.
Authentication & Security: JWT, OAuth2.0, SAML, OWASP best practices.
Database Management: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Firebase, Redis.
Serverless Development: AWS Lambda, Azure Functions, Firebase Functions.
Cloud & DevOps: AWS (S3, Lambda, EC2, CloudFront), Docker, Google Cloud, MS Azure, FireBase, Kubernetes, CI/CD (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI).
Version Control: Git, GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket.
Agile & Collaboration: Trello, Kanban, Jira, Confluence, Scrum  .
